content.text:
# Dumfries Vikings

The Dumfries Vikings are a defunct professional ice hockey team based in Dumfries, Scotland, which played in the British Hockey League[http://www.hockeydb.com/stte/dumfries-vikings-5567.html Dumfries Vikings hockey team statistics and history at hockeydb.com] from 1993 to 1996 (playing their final season as the Dumfries Border Vikings).
[http://www.hockeydb.com/stte/dumfries-border-vikings-5565.html Dumfries Border Vikings hockey team [BHL] statistics and history at hockeydb.com]
References
